main: ^Do you know Our Lady of Lourdes?

c-0: ^Yes! It is a Catholic shrine that sits on Mirador Hill in Baguio City. It was constructed in 1913 mainly out of limestone.
^This sculpture was created by the famous artist Isabelo Tampingco. Also, aside of as a place of worship, many tourist flock here for the scenic view of Baguio City that the grotto offers!
^The grotto took five years to complete, and to reach the grotto, you will have to climb up a stairway that made up of around 252 steps.
^That's all. If you want to know again the info about that. Just let me know.
